TopicTitle: SR-71 white bird, SR-72 white bird and B-2 Spirit bomber return for 1.0.2

Articles.Content:
I am proud to present the return of my 3 favourite planes for 1.0.2

![ku7hieD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ku7hieD.jpg)

**SR-71 White Bird V1.0.2**

![ruXBzWW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ruXBzWW.jpg)

![iBBs0Sc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iBBs0Sc.jpg)

![PCkhUnn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PCkhUnn.jpg)

**Description:** 

The training version of the plane as it is my favourite as far as looks go,

Easy to fly and capable of mach 3.3 this SR-72 is just about as good as the real thing.

**Cost:** 46,449

**Part count:** 67

> 
> ![ftsGdoa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ftsGdoa.jpg)
> 
> 

**Download link:** 

**SR-71 white bird:** 

[**http://www./download/wnblfwzrj3lxx7w/Sr-71+white+bird+V1\_0\_2.craft**](http://www./download/wnblfwzrj3lxx7w/Sr-71+white+bird+V1_0_2.craft)

**SR-72 White Bird V1.0.2**

![vQqAMTM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vQqAMTM.jpg)

![5tSAKu9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5tSAKu9.jpg)

![yFeDxdu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yFeDxdu.jpg)

**Description:** 

My take on the theoretical SR-72, manned because i like killing kerbals, capable of everything the SR-71 is only it does it all faster, very stable in flight almost like it is flying on rails, capable of skipping along the atmosphere at 20-30km to circumnav kerbin

**Cost:** 90,731

**Part count:** 222

> 
> ![QUt9DbZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QUt9DbZ.jpg)

**Download link:** 

[**http://www./download/f8b3tca53cqcyok/SR-72+White+bird+V1\_0\_2.craft**](http://www./download/f8b3tca53cqcyok/SR-72+White+bird+V1_0_2.craft)

**B-2 Spirit bomber V1.0.2**

![njzLcyE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/njzLcyE.jpg)

![UtFkMLF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UtFkMLF.jpg)

![GFMOmHj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GFMOmHj.jpg)

**Description:** 

B-2 Spirit bomber with a functional cargo bay, very easy to fly (it will lift off at 20m/s no joke) and capable of high altitude flight with ease.

As an added bonus this craft comes with a version with missiles and a version with cluster bombs, Good luck an have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Cost:** 62,592

**Part count:** 175

**Action groups:** 

1 toggles engines

2 toggles bay doors

**Flight instructions:** 

For the cluster bombs simply hit space bar to your hearts content with the bay doors open.

For the missiles release them then press "[" to switch to the missile and fire the engines, from here they are controllable and fly for quite a distance.

![UvGDwAE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UvGDwAE.jpg)

> 
> ![9GJirT2.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9GJirT2.jpg)
> 
> 

![QOYsVi3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QOYsVi3.jpg)

> 
> ![6AnxsiC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6AnxsiC.jpg)

[**http://www./download/is45zc0a7v3fcgr/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1\_0\_2.craft**](http://www./download/is45zc0a7v3fcgr/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1_0_2.craft)

**B-2 with cluster bombs:** part count 325

[**http://www./download/0qs3v603jt16c7s/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1\_0\_2+Cluster+bombs.craft**](http://www./download/0qs3v603jt16c7s/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1_0_2+Cluster+bombs.craft)

**B-2 with missiles:** part count 247

[**http://www./download/cb9u92961z2ea3z/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1\_0\_2+With+missiles.craft**](http://www./download/cb9u92961z2ea3z/B-2+Spirit+bomber+v1_0_2+With+missiles.craft)
